text: Giovanni Battista Bussi (Viterbo, 23 January 1755 – Benevento, 31 January 1844) was an Italian cleric. He was raised to cardinal by pope Leo XII in the consistory of 3 May 1824. ==References== ==External links== *http://www.catholic-hierarchy.org/bishop/bbussi.html Category:1755 births Category:1844 deaths Category:Italian cardinals
title: Giovanni Battista Bussi (1755–1844)
